name: Queens Gambit
description:
The Kingdom of Lorilaine lived in peace and harmony for thousands of years under the rule of King Radolit and Queen Lianne. This was until the fairies of Urvendale had crowned a new wretched queen. She hated the idea of sharing the title of queen with anyone that roams the land of Erador. She decided to kidnap Queen Lianne and jail her in The Cave of Eternal Fire, guarded by the ruthless dragon Omagu.  

To even reach the cave of eternal fire one must cross The Plains of Evergreen, scale past The Eternal Peak Mountains and navigate through The Mirkywood Forest.  

King Radolit gathered the most experienced adventurers in the land of Erador to complete this most daring task and bring peace and harmony back to the Kindom or Lorilaine.
